name: Confectionery
unlockCondition: Master Confectioner status, reliable supply of sugar and spices
calculationsAnalysis: The Confectionery produces exquisite sugar treats, a mark of luxury. High construction costs for specialized tools and presentation. Premium pricing leads to high income, but input costs (sugar, spices, fruits) are also significant. Employs master confectioners and artisans.
shortDescription: Creates fine sugar confections, candied fruits, and marzipan.
fullDescription: A Confectionery is where sugar is spun into art. These workshops produce a dazzling array of sweets, from delicate candied fruits and marzipan figures to elaborate sugar sculptures for banquets. Access to refined sugar and exotic spices is crucial for their creations.
flavorText: Sweetness sculpted, a fleeting taste of paradise for those who can afford it.

soundDesign.ambientSound: Gentle simmering, careful stirring, artistic molding sounds
soundDesign.activitySounds: Sugar pulling, fruit dicing, elaborate decorating

seasonalEffects.festivals: High demand for elaborate confections and sugar sculptures
seasonalEffects.fruit_harvests: Availability of fresh fruits for candying
